commit.message:
Andrew Haley <aph@cambridge.redhat.com>

2002-03-22  Tom Tromey  <tromey@redhat.com>

	Andrew Haley  <aph@cambridge.redhat.com>

	* expr.c (build_field_ref): Don't build a check if the field is a
	member of `this'.

From-SVN: r51213

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,10 @@
+2002-03-22  Tom Tromey  <tromey@redhat.com>
+
+	Andrew Haley  <aph@cambridge.redhat.com>
+
+	* expr.c (build_field_ref): Don't build a check if the field is a
+	member of `this'.
+
